title: Add file manager
description: As a project manager, I want a file manager interface so that I can organize, upload, view, and manage project files and documents directly within the AIPM workspace.
soThat: I can organize, upload, view, and manage project files and documents directly within the workspace

acceptanceTests.title: File upload functionality
given: I am logged into the AIPM workspace
I have access to the file manager
when: I select one or more files from my computer
then: The files should be uploaded successfully
I should see the uploaded files in the file list

acceptanceTests.title: File organization with folders
given: I have files uploaded in the file manager
when: I drag and drop files into the folder
then: Files should be moved to the folder
The folder structure should be preserved

acceptanceTests.title: File preview and download
given: I have files stored in the file manager
when: I click on a file to preview it
then: I should see a preview of the file content
The file should download to my computer

acceptanceTests.title: File search and filtering
given: I have multiple files in the file manager
when: I enter a search term in the file search box
then: Only matching files should be displayed
The search should work across file names and content
